system.description:
Your psionic abilities and those granted by your patron have woven more tightly together, allowing you to plug gaps left by one with the gifts of the other. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain access to the Psionics expanded spell list. If you already have it, you select a different list of your choice instead. In either case, the new spells are added to the warlock list in addition to those of your first expanded spell list choice.
  • Half your esper levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ulmcmf3ofmpzmgzf]{Eldritch Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0q5qeigzy5bv2zrq]{Extra Blast} features.
  • Half your warlock levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Attack Modes and Psychic Crush features.
  • If you have no psi dice available, you can spend 4 spell points to regain one psi die. Once you have used this benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
